TITLE: Change Password - FastComments
HEADING: Change Password
PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Min password length is six characters.
SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Success! Your password has been changed.
INVALID_LINK_MESSAGE: Oh no! It looks like this password reset link is invalid. Note that they can only be used once.
FAILURE_MESSAGE: Something went wrong. Please try again later. If this persists please reach out to support.
